title: Landauer Inlight

date: '2022-10-25'
slug: landauer_inlight

images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $852.1K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Landauer Inlight. The average
  contract duration was 0.52 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $167.1K. The longest
  contract was 4 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $681.2K.
lookup_name: 'LANDAUER INLIGHT'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '852.1K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '19'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '11%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '204%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '400.0K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.52'
s421_mean_contract_value: '167.1K'
s425_max_duration: '4'
s422_max_contract_value: '681.2K'
---
